name: Lay The Eggs: The Frog Edition
name_original: Lay The Eggs: The Frog Edition
description:
Late one night a farmer makes a mysterious discovery, that his barn has a little stowaway living inside! What’s more is that this little fellah lays….Golden Eggs!

Help our little friend successfully lay his golden eggs safely int his nest. Combining a wonderful physics engine, extremely clever puzzles and beautiful graphics. Lay the Egg is a must have game.
Lay the Egg Highlights

• Combines realistic physics with simple, yet accurate, and precise touch control.
• An incredible 3 worlds to conquer.
• Use precise timing to avoid obstacles.
• Collect three golden stars in each stage. Some are easy, some are a little on the harder side!
• Avoid jagged spikes and fight the power of a magnetic pull!.
